sentences.en: A few scrubby trees, like red alder, have re-established themselves, and ants, frogs, meadowlarks, beavers and other species have moved in.
sentences.cn: 一些矮灌木丛，像红桤木很快又长起来了，蚂蚁青蛙草地鸬海狸还有其他一些物种也都迁进来了。

sentences.en: Activated olefinic bond Amine, thiol radical initiator, cationic initiator, dienes ( Diels - alder reactive ).
sentences.cn: 活性烯键胺, 巯基,引发剂, 阳离子引发剂, 烯烃 ( 的Diels-Alder反应 ).

sentences.en: Alder ( Alnus nepalensis ), an important non - legume nitrogen - fixing plant, occurs widely in the eastern Himalayas.
sentences.cn: 桤木 ( Alnusnepalensis ) 是一种重要的 非 豆科固氮植物, 广泛分布于喜马拉雅山脉东部地区.

sentences.en: Alder trees belong to the birch family.
Diels - Alder reaction of 2 - merhylene - 1 - pheny 1 - 1.3 - butanedione catalysed by zinc chloride as lewis acid with 1.3 - cylcopentadiene was reported.
sentences.cn: 以氯化锌为路易斯酸催化剂,探讨了2 ─ 亚甲基─1 ─ 苯基 ─ 1.3 ─ 丁二酮与1.3 ─ 环戊二烯的Diels─Alder反应.

sentences.en: Diels — Alder reaction is one of the important research content in the fields of organic chemistry.
sentences.cn: Diels—Alder反应是目前有机化学领域重要研究内容之一.

sentences.en: Groves of stunted red spruce, huckleberry, blueberry, mountain laurel, mountain holly, speckled alder, and cranberry bogs, show combinations of colors throughout the year.
sentences.cn: 发育不良云杉的小树林、黑果木、蓝莓、山月桂、山冬青，斑点桤木和种越橘的沼泽地，显示着全年各种颜色的组合。

sentences.en: Its name is Ben Alder , it is a wild , desert mountain full of hills and hollows.
sentences.cn: 它的名字是本·亚尔德, 是一座尽是些山岗和鸡谷的漠无人烟的荒山.

sentences.en: Material: Gold Plated Alder Cone, gold plated bookmark.
sentences.cn: 素材: 镀金桤木球果吊饰, 镀金书签.

sentences.en: Material: Gold Plated Alder Cone, Green Chorite Crystal, gold plated bookmark.
sentences.cn: 素材: 镀金桤木球果吊饰, 绿幽灵水晶, 镀金书签.

sentences.en: Modification for synthetic purposes on the Diels - Alder adducts 56 and 62 has only rarely been considered.
sentences.cn: 为了达到合成的目的,对Diels-Alder加 成物(56)和(62)加以改造的问题很少有人考虑.

sentences.en: Suddenly, Alder think of the girl haven't paid him the taxi fare.
sentences.cn: 阿德突然想起还未向那位女生收钱,不反过头还好.

sentences.en: The alder nitrogen fixation promoted growth of the after crop.
sentences.cn: 十年生桤木林采伐迹地上,桤木固氮改良土壤,并促进后续植物的生长.

sentences.en: The meanders of a prattling brook, were shaded with straggling willows and alder trees.
sentences.cn: 一条小河蜿蜒掩映在稀疏的柳树和桤树的树荫间,淙淙作响.

sentences.en: The microorganisms involved in symbiosis with the alder tree are actinomycetes of the genus Frankia.
sentences.cn: 而与赤杨共生的微生物是放线菌.

sentences.en: They were principally used to catalyze aldol, allylation, Diels - Alder, ene and Friedel - Crafts reactions.
sentences.cn: 它们主要被用来催化Aldol, 烯丙基化, Diels-Alder, Ene和 Friedel -Crafts等反应.

sentences.en: When they reach the destination, Alder stopped the car and let her go down.
sentences.cn: 到了那个女生所说的地方时, 阿德就停车好让她下车了.

trans.tran_en: An alder is a species of tree or shrub that grows especially in cool, damp places and loses its leaves in winter
